text:
@GavinNewsom Governor let's bet 100K you get me to hug 100 coronavirus patients. 
They are allowed to cough at me, if want to.
If I get sick, I pay you 100K
If I don't get sick you are to pay me 100K in US dollars. 
I will not get sick.
Governor, 
You can kiss 100K goodbye
